SELECT A.BTN_ID, A.BTN_DISP_TYPE, A.BTN_CAPTION, A.BTN_CLASS , A.BTN_ICON, A.ICON_LOC, A.USE_YN, B.USER_NAME AS MOD_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.MOD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') MOD_DT , '' AS STATE_COL , 'Y' AS CHECK_VALUE FROM T_SYS_BTN_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_USER_INFO B ON A.MOD_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.BTN_ID LIKE '%${kSearchName}%'
AND A.BTN_CAPTION LIKE '%${kSearchName}%'
AND (A.BTN_ID LIKE '%${kSearchName}%' OR A.BTN_CAPTION LIKE '%${kSearchName}%')
ORDER BY A.BTN_ORDER
